Parameters: String: the message to use for this exception, may be null
UnsupportedTemporalTypeException(java.la.Description: Constructs a new UnsupportedTemporalTypeException with the specified message.

Parameters: String: the message to use for this exception, may be null
Throwable: the cause of the exception, may be null
UnsupportedTemporalTypeException(java.la.Description: Constructs a new UnsupportedTemporalTypeException with the specified message and cause.

ClassDesc: UnsupportedTemporalTypeException indicates that a ChronoField or ChronoUnit is not supported for a Temporal class.
